Text:
It works!


.:* English instructions *:.

For those who can't use the right analog stick on FIFA 13.

1- Copy both folders into your Documents folder.
2- Run the file "fifaconfig.exe" inside the fifaconfig folder, select Options, Controller, configure the controller, save the configuration, and exit the application.
3- Copy the file "buttonDataSetup.ini" located inside the FIFA 11 folder into your FIFA 13 folder.
4- Play!
